items.sentence: They don't just sell spatulas there, do they?
The conversation was interrupted momentarily.
We need to do something about this situation.
You'll probably find it difficult to do that.
Tom fell off his bicycle and injured himself.
I wish that Tom wouldn't take so many breaks.
I think we should tell Tom he has to do that.
I wonder whether I should tell Tom the truth.
Tom plays poker with his friends once a week.
Tom can't even look at Mary without blushing.
In case you change your mind, give me a call.
Back then, we weren't afraid to try anything.
Maybe I shouldn't've asked Tom that question.
I know that Tom is a very good soccer player.
I've bought everything I was planning to buy.
Santa Claus may not come to see us this year.
I would've done the same thing if I were you.
I'd feel uncomfortable asking Tom to do that.
Tom's old car has finally given up the ghost.
Tom poured the boiling water into the teapot.
